Rodimus stood looking at the others and nodded a look of cold resolve
on hi=
s face. =93Hydras needs to be put out of commission once and for
all.=94

=
=93I will stay here at the Ark to keep watch over it.=94 He shrugged
slight=
ly, =93With most of the force leaving, we need someone to watch
it.=94 He c=
rossed his arms over his chest, =93With Legacy, Santon and Bump
here, we sh=
ould be able to hold up for a while.=94

Lord Elder looked around, his opti=
cs intent and cautious, =93Remember,
Hydras has a very strong force over th=
ere, equal to ours, at least in
numbers.=94 Elder looked over at the monito=
r, =93Some of our forces are on
patrol; I will alert them should you guys n=
eed some back up.=94

Cheetor nods emphatically as the others talk and disc=
uss battle plans.
He looked over at Tuscon, =93I will travel with you. You =
may need the
back up.=94

Rodimus opened a commlink with the medbay where P=
erceptor, Legacy,
Bump and Santon were trying to work on Nightlight, =93How=
 are things
going in there? We could use Perceptor out here to help us to t=
ake
Hydras=92 base.=94
